function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of COVID-19 awareness among employees","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread and exposure in the workplace","Mitigation":"Promote COVID-19 awareness through various communication methods and educate employees on symptoms and prevention measures","Technologies":"Communication platforms, webinars, posters, emails","People":"Employees","Owner":"Employers"},{"Description":"Misinformation about COVID-19","Impact":"Increased uncertainty and confusion among employees, leading to more potential exposure to the virus","Mitigation":"Keep employees updated on accurate COVID-19 news and vaccination plans, address misinformation through reliable sources","Technologies":"Social media, webinars, emails, brief meetings","People":"Employees","Owner":"Employers"},{"Description":"Noncompliance with safety regulations","Impact":"Increased risk of virus exposure due to lack of adherence to safety measures","Mitigation":"Ensure safety and health officers enforce safety regulations, reward compliance, and discipline noncompliance","Technologies":"Supervision, reward systems, disciplinary procedures","People":"Workers","Owner":"Safety and health officers"}]}
